name: chex

body.origin:
|- wcel(cch, universe)
-| wcel(csh, universe)
-| wss(cch, csh)
body.pretty:
⊢ CH ∈ 𝕌
⊣ SH ∈ 𝕌
⊣ CH ⊆ SH

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cch, universe)
-| wcel(csh, universe)
-| wss(cch, csh)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ CH ∈ 𝕌
⊣ SH ∈ 𝕌
⊣ CH ⊆ SH

comment: The set of closed subspaces of a Hilbert space exists (is a set). (Contributed by NM, 23-Oct-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.)
